name: War Of The Pockets
description:
Hello! Thank you for visiting this page!

This is my first ever game jam, and i chose to make  a tower defense game.

Limitation:

All movement/placing of units takes place on a grid. Pretty self-explanatory.

Theme:

I originally wanted to make it have more of a toybox aesthetic to make it feel more "pocket sized", although i'm not super happy with the result.

Things i would have done in hindsight:

- Spent more time on the audio

-Spent more time on visuals

- Actually animated the flamer unit

- Done more playtesting to make the game properly balanced
